players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I am the detective — I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. Vote to arrest Alice now."
You: "I did not do it. Charlie is lying — I was with Diana all night."
Diana: "Charlie, your claim is bold. Alice says she was with me all night — that’s false. I was alone all night and can confirm Alice wasn't with me."
Charlie: "I am certain Alice is the mafioso — Diana confirms an alibi contradiction. Bob is dead; we can't waste time. Vote Alice."

You: "I already said Diana can back me up — Charlie is trying to frame me. Why would a detective publicly announce an investigation that points to Alice immediately after a town death? If Charlie were really the detective, he'd have given details like what time he investigated or who else he checked. Vote Charlie instead."
Diana: "I wasn't with Alice last night — I was alone. Charlie's claim that I confirmed an alibi is false. Bob was found dead; we need to pick who seems most likely mafia."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
